Html:
Radioman,

I am using map for some moths now and i am quit happy with it.

I have tried to figure out how to make a continuesmap like google.

So when you scroll to the left or right side of the map, the map will continue with the other side of the world.

One extra map on the right and left side would be great.

I have asked this before but still not succeeded in doing this.

Is this feature in your near planning? Or is one of the other users succeeded in this?

Is there any need for this feature, beside me?

 

Heru
it would be great to have such feature ;} ..but it's not my top priority

Radioman,

 

Any progress in this one? Any plan for starting with this feature?

 

Heru

yeah, it's top 2 issue, i guess the plan is to fix it somehow ;} it's not hard to render map, but how to synchronize all markers ;/ on bing/google, they jump to the other side if you scroll enough, so the i'm going to warp 9, engage! ;}
